apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji beautifully depicts a loving male couple, each with distinct medium-dark and medium-light skin tones, symbolizing diversity and inclusion in relationships. A radiant red heart, rendered with Apple's hallmark glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, sits centrally, signifying their profound bond. The tender embrace and serene expressions, a testament to Apple's nuanced character design, communicate love, partnership, and a strong emotional connection.
